name: Alec Bradley - Orchant Seleccion - Skinny
additionalNotes: The Alec Bradley Orchant Seleccion uses a Honduran seco wrapper from Trojes, with a dual binder of leaves from Estelí, Nicaragua and Trojes, Honduras. Underneath that is a Nicaraguan filler, with tobacco from Estelí and Jalapa. The cigars are being made in Danlí, Honduras, though the factory has not been specified. The Alec Bradley Orchant Seleccion is a medium-strength stick. It is handmade in Honduras. The Orchant Seleccion contains long-filler tobaccos from Nicaragua. The Alec Bradley Orchant Seleccion has a woodsy profile that is underscored with spicy and creamy notes.
